definition[0]: skilled work or advice from a particular type of worker who you use to help you do something
example[0]: Lydia obtained the services of a qualified nurse.
example[1]: Why don’t you offer your services as a tennis coach?
definition[1]: a place near a motorway where you can stop and have a meal or drink, or buy food, petrol etc
example[2]: How far is it to the next services?
